channel.title: Changing the site's design
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Changing the site's design"

item.title: Re: Changing the site's design
item.content:encoded:
No, the site change has been finished, so you can remove admin.

Whenever you are needed my help, just PM to me. Than I will help you.

item.title: Re: Changing the site's design
item.content:encoded:
Thanks so much of your contribution for this wiki! It looks clean and beatiful and I like it so much.

Have anything on this site still need to be adjust? If none, I would like to remove the admin.

Wish can get your help if the Chinese sandbox has built.

item.title: Changing the site's design
item.content:encoded:
I've finished changing the site's design. Here is the update log:

  1. Mobile·Tablet response
  2. Forum CSS Update
  3. New features: Ruby and Keycap

Ruby

 [[span class="ruby"]]汉字[[span class="rt"]]Hànzì[[/span]][[/span]]

汉字Hànzì

Keycap

 [[span class="keycap"]]Ctrl[[/span]] + [[span class="keycap"]]C[[/span]]

Ctrl + C
